item.title: 0x13hrafnulf's Challenges
item.description: Who is 0x13hrafnulf? Simple DLL injector with GUI (dll-inj) in development Simple DLL injector with GUI written in C++ for educational purposes only Demo Code organization source code GUI - GUI management using Dear ImGui Injection - DLL injection implemention using Windows API OpenDialogBox - file selection dialog box using Windows API Proc - process and process modules querying handler Application - application and app window management Description Coming soon…
